r01.title: R1 - Define context clearly
r01.description: Develop and document the subject, purpose, and intended use(s) of the model or simulation.

r02.title: R2 - Use appropriate data
r02.description: Employ relevant and traceable information in the development or operation of a model or simulation.

r03.title: R3 - Evaluate within context
r03.description: Verification, validation, uncertainty quantification, and sensitivity analysis of the model or simulation are accomplished with respect to the reality of interest and intended use(s) of the model or simulation.

r04.title: R4 - List limitations explicitly
r04.description: Restrictions, constraints, or qualifications for or on the use of the model or simulation are available for consideration by the users or customers of a model or simulation.

r05.title: R5 - Use version control
r05.description: Implement a system to trace the time history of M&S activities including delineation of contributors' efforts.

r06.title: R6 - Document adequately
r06.description: Maintain up-to-date informative record of all M&S activities, including simulation code, model mark-up, scope and intended use of M&S activities, as well as users' and developers' guides.

r07.title: R7 - Disseminate broadly
r07.description: Publish all components of M&S activities, including simulation software, models, simulation scenarios and results.

r08.title: R8 - Get independent reviews
r08.description: Have the M&S activity reviewed by nonpartisan third-party users and developers.

r09.title: R9 - Test competing implementations
r09.description: Use contrasting M&S execution strategies to check the conclusions of the different execution strategies against each other.

r10.title: R10 - Conform to standards
r10.description: Adopt and promote generally applicable and discipline specific operating procedures, guidelines, and regulations accepted as best practices.

purpose.title: Intended purpose/context
purpose.description: Description of the field of application and associated research initiatives (if any)

vandv.title: Verification & Validation
vandv.description: Description of verification and validation testing performed for the model and/or code submitted, or a link to these tests

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Link to documentation to use this service

standards.title: Relevant standards
standards.description: List or links of any data management, coding, experimental, or other standards implemented
